name: SNOMED CT to ICD-10-CM mappings for fracture of ulna
description: Example rule-based mappings between SNOMED CT to ICD-10-CM for fracture of ulna

target.comments: The target mapping to ICD-10-CM is narrower, since additional patient data on the encounter (initial vs. subsequent) and fracture type is required for a valid ICD-10-CM mapping.

The target mapping to ICD-10-CM is narrower, since additional patient data on the encounter (initial vs. subsequent), fracture type and healing (for subsequent encounter) is required for a valid ICD-10-CM mapping.
